data.name: h_desc
data.value: Either shows a help for a single command, or PMs you help link if no arguments are specified.

data.name: hgit_desc
data.value: Generates the commandlist.md file. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: readme_desc
data.value: Sends a readme and a guide links to the channel.

data.name: commands_desc
data.value: List all of the bot's commands from a certain module.

data.name: grdel_desc
data.value: Toggles automatic deletion of greet and bye messages. **Needs Manage Server Permissions.**

data.name: greet_desc
data.value: Toggles anouncements on the current channel when someone joins the server. **Needs Manage Server Permissions.**

data.name: greetmsg_desc
data.value: Sets a new join announcement message. Type %user% if you want to mention the new member. Using it with no message will show the current greet message. **Needs Manage Server Permissions.**

data.name: bye_desc
data.value: Toggles anouncements on the current channel when someone leaves the server.

data.name: byemsg_desc
data.value: Sets a new leave announcement message. Type %user% if you want to mention the new member. Using it with no message will show the current bye message. **Needs Manage Server Permissions.**

data.name: byepm_desc
data.value: Toggles whether the good bye messages will be sent in a PM or in the text channel. **Needs Manage Server Permissions.**

data.name: greetpm_desc
data.value: Toggles whether the greet messages will be sent in a PM or in the text channel. **Needs Manage Server Permissions.**

data.name: spmom_desc
data.value: Toggles whether mentions of other offline users on your server will send a pm to them. **Needs Manage Server Permissions.**

data.name: logserver_desc
data.value: Toggles logging in this channel. Logs every message sent/deleted/edited on the server. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: logignore_desc
data.value: Toggles whether the .logserver command ignores this channel. Useful if you have hidden admin channel and public log channel. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: userpresence_desc
data.value: Starts logging to this channel when someone from the server goes online/offline/idle. **Needs Manage Server Permissions.**

data.name: voicepresence_desc
data.value: Toggles logging to this channel whenever someone joins or leaves a voice channel you are in right now. **Needs Manage Server Permissions.**

data.name: repeatinvoke_desc
data.value: Immediately shows the repeat message and restarts the timer. **Needs Manage Messages Permissions.**

data.name: repeat_desc
data.value: Repeat a message every X minutes. If no parameters are specified, repeat is disabled. **Needs Manage Messages Permissions.**

data.name: rotateplaying_desc
data.value: Toggles rotation of playing status of the dynamic strings you specified earlier. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: addplaying_desc
data.value: Adds a specified string to the list of playing strings to rotate. Supported placeholders: %servers%, %users%, %playing%, %queued%, %trivia% **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: listplaying_desc
data.value: Lists all playing statuses with their corresponding number. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: removeplaying_desc
data.value: Removes a playing string on a given number. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: slowmode_desc
data.value: Toggles slow mode. When ON, users will be able to send only 1 message every 5 seconds. **Needs Manage Messages Permissions.**

data.name: cleanv+t_desc
data.value: Deletes all text channels ending in `-voice` for which voicechannels are not found. **Use at your own risk. Needs Manage Roles and Manage Channels Permissions.**

data.name: voice+text_desc
data.value: Creates a text channel for each voice channel only users in that voice channel can see.If you are server owner, keep in mind you will see them all the time regardless. **Needs Manage Roles and Manage Channels Permissions.**

data.name: scsc_desc
data.value: Starts an instance of cross server channel. You will get a token as a DM that other people will use to tune in to the same instance. **Bot Owner Only.**

data.name: jcsc_desc
data.value: Joins current channel to an instance of cross server channel using the token. **Needs Manage Server Permissions.**

data.name: lcsc_desc
data.value: Leaves Cross server channel instance from this channel. **Needs Manage Server Permissions.**

data.name: asar_desc
data.value: Adds a role, or list of roles separated by whitespace(use quotations for multiword roles) to the list of self-assignable roles. **Needs Manage Roles Permissions.**

data.name: rsar_desc
data.value: Removes a specified role from the list of self-assignable roles.

data.name: togglexclsar_desc
data.value: toggle whether the self-assigned roles should be exclusive

data.name: iam_desc
data.value: Adds a role to you that you choose. Role must be on a list of self-assignable roles.

data.name: iamnot_desc
data.value: Removes a role to you that you choose. Role must be on a list of self-assignable roles.

data.name: addcustreact_desc
data.value: Add a custom reaction. Guide here: <https://github.com/Kwoth/NadekoBot/wiki/Custom-Reactions> **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: listcustreact_desc
data.value: Lists custom reactions (paginated with 30 commands per page). Use 'all' instead of page number to get all custom reactions DM-ed to you.

data.name: showcustreact_desc
data.value: Shows all possible responses from a single custom reaction.

data.name: editcustreact_desc
data.value: Edits a custom reaction, arguments are custom reactions name, index to change, and a (multiword) message **Bot Owner Only**

data.name: delcustreact_desc
data.value: Deletes a custom reaction with given name (and index). **Bot Owner Only.**

data.name: autoassignrole_desc
data.value: Automaticaly assigns a specified role to every user who joins the server. **Needs Manage Roles Permissions.**

data.name: autoassignrole_summary
data.value: `.aar` to disable, `.aar Role Name` to enable

data.name: leave_desc
data.value: Makes Nadeko leave the server. Either name or id required. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: listincidents_desc
data.value: List all UNREAD incidents and flags them as read. **Needs Manage Server Permissions.**

data.name: listallincidents_desc
data.value: Sends you a file containing all incidents and flags them as read. **Needs Manage Server Permissions.**

data.name: delmsgoncmd_desc
data.value: Toggles the automatic deletion of user's successful command message to prevent chat flood. **Server Manager Only.**

data.name: restart_desc
data.value: Restarts the bot. Might not work. **Bot Owner Only**

data.name: setrole_desc
data.value: Sets a role for a given user. **Needs Manage Roles Permissions.**

data.name: removerole_desc
data.value: Removes a role from a given user. **Needs Manage Roles Permissions.**

data.name: renamerole_desc
data.value: Renames a role. Roles you are renaming must be lower than bot's highest role. **Manage Roles Permissions.**

data.name: removeallroles_desc
data.value: Removes all roles from a mentioned user. **Needs Manage Roles Permissions.**

data.name: createrole_desc
data.value: Creates a role with a given name. **Needs Manage Roles Permissions.**

data.name: rolecolor_desc
data.value: Set a role's color to the hex or 0-255 rgb color value provided. **Needs Manage Roles Permissions.**

data.name: ban_desc
data.value: Bans a user by id or name with an optional message. **Needs Ban Permissions.**

data.name: softban_desc
data.value: Bans and then unbans a user by id or name with an optional message. **Needs Ban Permissions.**

data.name: kick_desc
data.value: Kicks a mentioned user. **Needs Kick Permissions.**

data.name: mute_desc
data.value: Mutes mentioned user or users. **Needs Mute Permissions.**

data.name: unmute_desc
data.value: Unmutes mentioned user or users. **Needs Mute Permissions.**

data.name: deafen_desc
data.value: Deafens mentioned user or users. **Needs Deafen Permissions.**

data.name: undeafen_desc
data.value: Undeafens mentioned user or users. **Needs Deafen Permissions.**

data.name: delvoichanl_desc
data.value: Deletes a voice channel with a given name. **Needs Manage Channel Permissions.**

data.name: creatvoichanl_desc
data.value: Creates a new voice channel with a given name. **Needs Manage Channel Permissions.**

data.name: deltxtchanl_desc
data.value: Deletes a text channel with a given name. **Needs Manage Channel Permissions.**

data.name: creatxtchanl_desc
data.value: Creates a new text channel with a given name. **Needs Manage Channel Permissions.**

data.name: settopic_desc
data.value: Sets a topic on the current channel. **Needs Manage Channel Permissions.**

data.name: setchanlname_desc
data.value: Changed the name of the current channel. **Needs Manage Channel Permissions.**

data.name: prune_desc
data.value: `.prune` removes all nadeko's messages in the last 100 messages.`.prune X` removes last X messages from the channel (up to 100)`.prune @Someone` removes all Someone's messages in the last 100 messages.`.prune @Someone X` removes last X 'Someone's' messages in the channel. **Needs Manage Messages Permissions**

data.name: die_desc
data.value: Shuts the bot down and notifies users about the restart. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: setname_desc
data.value: Give the bot a new name. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: newavatar_desc
data.value: Sets a new avatar image for the NadekoBot. Argument is a direct link to an image. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: setgame_desc
data.value: Sets the bots game. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: send_desc
data.value: Send a message to someone on a different server through the bot. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: mentionrole_desc
data.value: Mentions every person from the provided role or roles (separated by a ',') on this server. Requires you to have mention everyone permission.

data.name: unstuck_desc
data.value: Clears the message queue. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: donators_desc
data.value: List of lovely people who donated to keep this project alive.

data.name: donadd_desc
data.value: Add a donator to the database. **Kwoth Only**

data.name: announce_desc
data.value: Sends a message to all servers' general channel bot is connected to.**Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: savechat_desc
data.value: Saves a number of messages to a text file and sends it to you. **Bot Owner Only**

data.name: remind_desc
data.value: Sends a message to you or a channel after certain amount of time. First argument is me/here/'channelname'. Second argument is time in a descending order (mo>w>d>h>m) example: 1w5d3h10m. Third argument is a (multiword)message.

data.name: remind_summary
data.value: `.remind me 1d5h Do something` or `.remind #general Start now!`

data.name: remindmsg_desc
data.value: Sets message for when the remind is triggered. Available placeholders are %user% - user who ran the command, %message% - Message specified in the remind, %target% - target channel of the remind. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: serverinfo_desc
data.value: Shows info about the server the bot is on. If no channel is supplied, it defaults to current one.

data.name: channelinfo_desc
data.value: Shows info about the channel. If no channel is supplied, it defaults to current one.

data.name: userinfo_desc
data.value: Shows info about the user. If no user is supplied, it defaults a user running the command.

data.name: whoplays_desc
data.value: Shows a list of users who are playing the specified game.

data.name: inrole_desc
data.value: Lists every person from the provided role or roles (separated by a ',') on this server. If the list is too long for 1 message, you must have Manage Messages permission.

data.name: checkmyperms_desc
data.value: Checks your userspecific permissions on this channel.

data.name: stats_desc
data.value: Shows some basic stats for Nadeko.

data.name: dysyd_desc
data.value: Shows some basic stats for Nadeko.

data.name: roles_desc
data.value: List all roles on this server or a single user if specified.

data.name: channeltopic_desc
data.value: Sends current channel's topic as a message.

data.name: chnlfilterinv_desc
data.value: Enables or disables automatic deleting of invites on the channel.If no channel supplied, it will default to current one. Use ALL to apply to all existing channels at once.

data.name: srvrfilterinv_desc
data.value: Enables or disables automatic deleting of invites on the server.

data.name: chnlfilterwords_desc
data.value: Enables or disables automatic deleting of messages containing banned words on the channel.If no channel supplied, it will default to current one. Use ALL to apply to all existing channels at once.

data.name: addfilterword_desc
data.value: Adds a new word to the list of filtered words

data.name: rmvfilterword_desc
data.value: Removes the word from the list of filtered words

data.name: lstfilterwords_desc
data.value: Shows a list of filtered words

data.name: srvrfilterwords_desc
data.value: Enables or disables automatic deleting of messages containing forbidden words on the server.

data.name: permrole_desc
data.value: Sets a role which can change permissions. Or supply no parameters to find out the current one. Default one is 'Nadeko'.

data.name: rolepermscopy_desc
data.value: Copies BOT PERMISSIONS (not discord permissions) from one role to another.

data.name: chnlpermscopy_desc
data.value: Copies BOT PERMISSIONS (not discord permissions) from one channel to another.

data.name: usrpermscopy_desc
data.value: Copies BOT PERMISSIONS (not discord permissions) from one role to another.

data.name: verbose_desc
data.value: Sets whether to show when a command/module is blocked.

data.name: srvrperms_desc
data.value: Shows banned permissions for this server.

data.name: roleperms_desc
data.value: Shows banned permissions for a certain role. No argument means for everyone.

data.name: chnlperms_desc
data.value: Shows banned permissions for a certain channel. No argument means for this channel.

data.name: userperms_desc
data.value: Shows banned permissions for a certain user. No argument means for yourself.

data.name: srvrmdl_desc
data.value: Sets a module's permission at the server level.

data.name: srvrcmd_desc
data.value: Sets a command's permission at the server level.

data.name: rolemdl_desc
data.value: Sets a module's permission at the role level.

data.name: rolecmd_desc
data.value: Sets a command's permission at the role level.

data.name: chnlmdl_desc
data.value: Sets a module's permission at the channel level.

data.name: chnlcmd_desc
data.value: Sets a command's permission at the channel level.

data.name: usrmdl_desc
data.value: Sets a module's permission at the user level.

data.name: usrcmd_desc
data.value: Sets a command's permission at the user level.

data.name: allsrvrmdls_desc
data.value: Sets permissions for all modules at the server level.

data.name: allsrvrcmds_desc
data.value: Sets permissions for all commands from a certain module at the server level.

data.name: allchnlmdls_desc
data.value: Sets permissions for all modules at the channel level.

data.name: allchnlcmds_desc
data.value: Sets permissions for all commands from a certain module at the channel level.

data.name: allrolemdls_desc
data.value: Sets permissions for all modules at the role level.

data.name: allrolecmds_desc
data.value: Sets permissions for all commands from a certain module at the role level.

data.name: ubl_desc
data.value: Blacklists a mentioned user. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: uubl_desc
data.value: Unblacklists a mentioned user. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: cbl_desc
data.value: Blacklists a mentioned channel (#general for example).

data.name: cubl_desc
data.value: Unblacklists a mentioned channel (#general for example).

data.name: sbl_desc
data.value: Blacklists a server by a name or id (#general for example). **BOT OWNER ONLY**

data.name: cmdcooldown_desc
data.value: Sets a cooldown per user for a command. Set 0 to clear. **Needs Manager Messages Permissions**

data.name: allcmdcooldowns_desc
data.value: Shows a list of all commands and their respective cooldowns.

data.name: .._desc
data.value: Adds a new quote with the specified name (single word) and message (no limit).

data.name: ..._desc
data.value: Shows a random quote with a specified name.

data.name: ..qdel_desc
data.value: Deletes all quotes with the specified keyword. You have to either be bot owner or the creator of the quote to delete it.

data.name: rip_desc
data.value: Shows a grave image of someone with a start year

data.name: die_desc
data.value: Works only for the owner. Shuts the bot down.

data.name: do you love me_desc
data.value: Replies with positive answer only to the bot owner.

data.name: how are you_desc
data.value: Replies positive only if bot owner is online.

data.name: fire_desc
data.value: Shows a unicode fire message. Optional parameter [x] tells her how many times to repeat the fire.

data.name: dump_desc
data.value: Dumps all of the invites it can to dump.txt.** Owner Only.**

data.name: draw_desc
data.value: Draws a card from the deck.If you supply number [x], she draws up to 5 cards from the deck.

data.name: shuffle_desc
data.value: Reshuffles all cards back into the deck.

data.name: flip_desc
data.value: Flips coin(s) - heads or tails, and shows an image.

data.name: betflip_desc
data.value: Bet to guess will the result be heads or tails. Guessing award you double flowers you've bet.

data.name: roll_desc
data.value: Rolls 0-100. If you supply a number [x] it rolls up to 30 normal dice. If you split 2 numbers with letter d (xdy) it will roll x dice from 1 to y.

data.name: rolluo_desc
data.value: Rolls 0-100. If you supply a number [x] it rolls up to 30 normal dice (unordered). If you split 2 numbers with letter d (xdy) it will roll x dice from 1 to y.

data.name: joinrace_desc
data.value: Joins a new race. You can specify an amount of flowers for betting (optional). You will get YourBet*(participants-1) back if you win.

data.name: raffle_desc
data.value: Prints a name and ID of a random user from the online list from the (optional) role.

data.name: $$_desc
data.value: Check how much NadekoFlowers a person has. (Defaults to yourself)

data.name: give_desc
data.value: Give someone a certain amount of NadekoFlowers

data.name: award_desc
data.value: Gives someone a certain amount of flowers. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: take_desc
data.value: Takes a certain amount of flowers from someone. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: betroll_desc
data.value: Bets a certain amount of NadekoFlowers and rolls a dice. Rolling over 66 yields x2 flowers, over 90 - x3 and 100 x10.

data.name: t_desc
data.value: Starts a game of trivia. You can add nohint to prevent hints.First player to get to 10 points wins by default. You can specify a different number. 30 seconds per question.

data.name: tq_desc
data.value: Quits current trivia after current question.

data.name: typestop_desc
data.value: Stops a typing contest on the current channel.

data.name: typeadd_desc
data.value: Adds a new article to the typing contest. Owner only.

data.name: poll_desc
data.value: Creates a poll, only person who has manage server permission can do it. **Needs Manage Server Permissions**

data.name: pollend_desc
data.value: Stops active poll on this server and prints the results in this channel.

data.name: pick_desc
data.value: Picks a flower planted in this channel.

data.name: plant_desc
data.value: Spend a flower to plant it in this channel. (If bot is restarted or crashes, flower will be lost)

data.name: gencurrency_desc
data.value: Toggles currency generation on this channel. Every posted message will have 2% chance to spawn a NadekoFlower. Optional parameter cooldown time in minutes, 5 minutes by default. Requires Manage Messages permission.

data.name: leet_desc
data.value: Converts a text to leetspeak with 6 (1-6) severity levels

data.name: choose_desc
data.value: Chooses a thing from a list of things

data.name: rps_desc
data.value: Play a game of rocket paperclip scissors with Nadeko.

data.name: next_desc
data.value: Goes to the next song in the queue. You have to be in the same voice channel as the bot.

data.name: stop_desc
data.value: Stops the music and clears the playlist. Stays in the channel.

data.name: destroy_desc
data.value: Completely stops the music and unbinds the bot from the channel. (may cause weird behaviour)

data.name: queue_desc
data.value: Queue a song using keywords or a link. Bot will join your voice channel.**You must be in a voice channel**.

data.name: soundcloudqueue_desc
data.value: Queue a soundcloud song using keywords. Bot will join your voice channel.**You must be in a voice channel**.

data.name: listqueue_desc
data.value: Lists 15 currently queued songs per page. Default page is 1.

data.name: defvol_desc
data.value: Sets the default music volume when music playback is started (0-100). Persists through restarts.

data.name: playlist_desc
data.value: Queues up to 500 songs from a youtube playlist specified by a link, or keywords.

data.name: soundcloudpl_desc
data.value: Queue a soundcloud playlist using a link.

data.name: localplaylst_desc
data.value: Queues all songs from a directory. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: radio_desc
data.value: Queues a radio stream from a link. It can be a direct mp3 radio stream, .m3u, .pls .asx or .xspf (Usage Video: <https://streamable.com/al54>)

data.name: local_desc
data.value: Queues a local file by specifying a full path. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: move_desc
data.value: Moves the bot to your voice channel. (works only if music is already playing)

data.name: remove_desc
data.value: Remove a song by its # in the queue, or 'all' to remove whole queue.

data.name: movesong_desc
data.value: Moves a song from one position to another.

data.name: setmaxqueue_desc
data.value: Sets a maximum queue size. Supply 0 or no argument to have no limit.

data.name: cleanup_desc
data.value: Cleans up hanging voice connections. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: rpeatplaylst_desc
data.value: Toggles repeat of all songs in the queue (every song that finishes is added to the end of the queue).

data.name: save_desc
data.value: Saves a playlist under a certain name. Name must be no longer than 20 characters and mustn't contain dashes.

data.name: load_desc
data.value: Loads a playlist under a certain name.

data.name: playlists_desc
data.value: Lists all playlists. Paginated. 20 per page. Default page is 0.

data.name: deleteplaylist_desc
data.value: Deletes a saved playlist. Only if you made it or if you are the bot owner.

data.name: goto_desc
data.value: Goes to a specific time in seconds in a song.

data.name: getlink_desc
data.value: Shows a link to the song in the queue by index, or the currently playing song by default.

data.name: autoplay_desc
data.value: Toggles autoplay - When the song is finished, automatically queue a related youtube song. (Works only for youtube songs and when queue is empty)

data.name: lolchamp_desc
data.value: Shows League Of Legends champion statistics. If there are spaces/apostrophes or in the name - omit them. Optional second parameter is a role.

data.name: lolban_desc
data.value: Shows top 6 banned champions ordered by ban rate. Ban these champions and you will be Plat 5 in no time.

data.name: hitbox_desc
data.value: Notifies this channel when a certain user starts streaming.

data.name: twitch_desc
data.value: Notifies this channel when a certain user starts streaming.

data.name: beam_desc
data.value: Notifies this channel when a certain user starts streaming.

data.name: checkhitbox_desc
data.value: Checks if a certain user is streaming on the hitbox platform.

data.name: checktwitch_desc
data.value: Checks if a certain user is streaming on the twitch platform.

data.name: checkbeam_desc
data.value: Checks if a certain user is streaming on the beam platform.

data.name: removestream_desc
data.value: Removes notifications of a certain streamer on this channel.

data.name: liststreams_desc
data.value: Lists all streams you are following on this server.

data.name: convertlist_desc
data.value: List of the convertable dimensions and currencies.

data.name: wowjoke_desc
data.value: Get one of Kwoth's penultimate WoW jokes.

data.name: osu_desc
data.value: Shows osu stats for a player.

data.name: osu b_desc
data.value: Shows information about an osu beatmap.

data.name: memelist_desc
data.value: Pulls a list of memes you can use with `~memegen` from http://memegen.link/templates/

data.name: memegen_desc
data.value: Generates a meme from memelist with top and bottom text.

data.name: we_desc
data.value: Shows weather data for a specified city and a country. BOTH ARE REQUIRED. Use country abbrevations.

data.name: yt_desc
data.value: Searches youtubes and shows the first result

data.name: ani_desc
data.value: Queries anilist for an anime and shows the first result.

data.name: imdb_desc
data.value: Queries imdb for movies or series, show first result.

data.name: mang_desc
data.value: Queries anilist for a manga and shows the first result.

data.name: i_desc
data.value: Pulls the first image found using a search parameter. Use ~ir for different results.

data.name: ir_desc
data.value: Pulls a random image using a search parameter.

data.name: google_desc
data.value: Get a google search link for some terms.

data.name: hs_desc
data.value: Searches for a Hearthstone card and shows its image. Takes a while to complete.

data.name: ud_desc
data.value: Searches Urban Dictionary for a word.

data.name: chucknorris_desc
data.value: Shows a random chucknorris joke from <http://tambal.azurewebsites.net/joke/random>

data.name: revav_desc
data.value: Returns a google reverse image search for someone's avatar.

data.name: revimg_desc
data.value: Returns a google reverse image search for an image from a link.

data.name: safebooru_desc
data.value: Shows a random image from safebooru with a given tag. Tag is optional but preffered. (multiple tags are appended with +)

data.name: wiki_desc
data.value: Gives you back a wikipedia link

data.name: clr_desc
data.value: Shows you what color corresponds to that hex.

data.name: videocall_desc
data.value: Creates a private <http://www.appear.in> video call link for you and other mentioned people. The link is sent to mentioned people via a private message.

data.name: hentai_desc
data.value: Shows a random NSFW hentai image from gelbooru and danbooru with a given tag. Tag is optional but preffered. (multiple tags are appended with +)

data.name: danbooru_desc
data.value: Shows a random hentai image from danbooru with a given tag. Tag is optional but preffered. (multiple tags are appended with +)

data.name: gelbooru_desc
data.value: Shows a random hentai image from gelbooru with a given tag. Tag is optional but preffered. (multiple tags are appended with +)

data.name: rule34_desc
data.value: Shows a random image from rule34.xx with a given tag. Tag is optional but preffered. (multiple tags are appended with +)

data.name: e621_desc
data.value: Shows a random hentai image from e621.net with a given tag. Tag is optional but preffered. Use spaces for multiple tags.

data.name: cp_desc
data.value: We all know where this will lead you to.

data.name: createwar_desc
data.value: Creates a new war by specifying a size (>10 and multiple of 5) and enemy clan name.

data.name: startwar_desc
data.value: Starts a war with a given number.

data.name: listwar_desc
data.value: Shows the active war claims by a number. Shows all wars in a short way if no number is specified.

data.name: claim_desc
data.value: Claims a certain base from a certain war. You can supply a name in the third optional argument to claim in someone else's place.

data.name: claimfinish_desc
data.value: Finish your claim with 3 stars if you destroyed a base. Optional second argument finishes for someone else.

data.name: claimfinish2_desc
data.value: Finish your claim with 2 stars if you destroyed a base. Optional second argument finishes for someone else.

data.name: claimfinish1_desc
data.value: Finish your claim with 1 stars if you destroyed a base. Optional second argument finishes for someone else.

data.name: unclaim_desc
data.value: Removes your claim from a certain war. Optional second argument denotes a person in whose place to unclaim

data.name: endwar_desc
data.value: Ends the war with a given index.

data.name: attack_desc
data.value: Attacks a target with the given move. Use `>movelist` to see a list of moves your type can use.

data.name: movelist_desc
data.value: Lists the moves you are able to use

data.name: heal_desc
data.value: Heals someone. Revives those who fainted. Costs a NadekoFlower

data.name: type_desc
data.value: Get the poketype of the target.

data.name: settype_desc
data.value: Set your poketype. Costs a NadekoFlower.

data.name: translate_desc
data.value: Translates from>to text. From the given language to the destiation language.

data.name: translangs_desc
data.value: List the valid languages for translation.

data.name: bind_desc
data.value: Bind a trello bot to a single channel. You will receive notifications from your board when something is added or edited. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: unbind_desc
data.value: Unbinds a bot from the channel and board. **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: lists_desc
data.value: Lists all lists, yo ;) **Bot Owner Only!**

data.name: cards_desc
data.value: Lists all cards from the supplied list. You can supply either a name or an index. **Bot Owner Only!**
